pages.text: I am a Tengu, while I am a Reader, too.$(br2)When I hold this forging hammer, I have been professional smith.$(br2)They always kept requiring more power for killing each other, even lost their conscience.

The Sword of Logos, should have been a group who protect all people with their Blades. I hate their ridiculous demands. These two Blades will fight against them. Both for we Tengus, and for we Readers.
